message.content: Most men in Spain have a more accepting and positive attitude towards divorce compared to previous generations. They generally understand that divorce is a normal part of modern life and believe that people have the right to end an unhappy or unhealthy marriage. Men in Spain recognize that divorce can provide individuals with a chance for personal growth and happiness. Additionally, they tend to prioritize the well-being and happiness of their children, understanding that divorce may sometimes be the best solution for a dysfunctional marriage. Overall, most men in Spain view divorce as a reasonable and fair option in certain circumstances rather than regarding it negatively.
